page.title: 06Employment
page.content: In this well farmed area there is little unemployment. Increased mechanisation, EEC regulations & the break up of the{Hever Estate}caused some unemployment but most of those affected soon found other work as self employed sub contractors, gardeners, forestry workers supplying logs for open fireplaces, woodburning stoves & wood for gates & fencing. The two Inns, Newsagent, Bakery & Vinery employ local people. There is part time & seasonal work available during hop picking & harvesting & domestic work, regular & seasonal during the summer in the Inns & farms providing bed & breakfast accommodation for tourists. Maintenance & repair of farm machinery & buildings provides all year round work.
